name: KPI-ML
tagline: Work in progress on materials for MESA KPI-ML
body:
### Welcome to my KPI-ML fork.
KPI-ML is an XML implementation of the ISO 22400 standard for Automation systems integration - Key performance indicators (KPIs) for manufacturing operations management. This fork is where I work on enhancements and revisions to the [MESA KPI-ML standard](http://www.mesa.org/en/KPIML.asp), and particularly on making software implementations easier in C# and Java. See the [MESA GitHub site](https://github.com/MESAInternational/KPI-ML) for official releases.

### Authors and Contributors
I collaborate mainly with @Emers, @Dennis-Brandl, and @JoeDo on the [MESA XML Committee](http://www.mesa.org/en/committeeactivities/xmlcommittee.asp), and with others on the [MESA APM (Asset Performance Management) Committee](http://www.mesa.org/en/modelstrategicinitiatives/APM.asp).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
